Koga Shuko/Unitron/Sixshot/Anubis/Hades/Serpentor:



Unitron and Sixshot saw on their scanners, the alien signature going into the 
Pred base.  <Shuko, the alien thing is in the Predacon base>

<Slag!  Draw the weapons fire from the Predacon base away from the direction 
we are approaching>

<Understood>


Unitron and Sixshot dived after getting target locks, firing 4 missiles each 
off at the Predacon base.


Koga and co headed for the Pred base.
